name: root
triggers: AyakaTrigger(app_name=ayaka_master cmds=['插件', 'plugin', 'plugins'] func=show_plugins deep=all block=True model=None)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=ayaka_master cmds=['状态', 'state'] func=show_state deep=all block=True model=None)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=ayaka_master cmds=['帮助', 'help'] func=show_help deep=all block=True model=None)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=ayaka_master cmds=['强制退出', 'force_exit'] func=force_exit deep=all block=True model=None)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=ayaka_master cmds=['add_admin'] func=add_admin deep=all block=True model=<class 'ayaka.ayaka_master.UidInput'>)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=ayaka_master cmds=['remove_admin'] func=remove_admin deep=all block=True model=<class 'ayaka.ayaka_master.UidInput'>)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=星际旅行 cmds=['星际旅行'] func=app_start deep=0 block=True model=None)
AyakaTrigger(app_name=星际旅行-new cmds=['星际旅行-new'] func=func deep=0 block=True model=None)
